teaser: On today's show, Lindsey Turrentine, Editor-in-Chief of Reviews at CNET, talks about the launch of Playstation TV & why Sony wants in on the streaming content business. Plus, Stephen Beard tells the story of 29 high tech statues that have been given voice as part of a public art project in London.
description: On today's show, Lindsey Turrentine, Editor-in-Chief of Reviews at CNET, talks about the launch of Playstation TV & why Sony wants in on the streaming content business. Plus, Stephen Beard tells the story of 29 high tech statues that have been given voice as part of a public art project in London.
title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, October 14, 2014
